scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6
scripts.build-es6: rm -fr dist-es6 && BABEL_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es5: rm -fr dist && BABEL_ENV=es5 babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps inline
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-es5
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run build
